name: SepticShock
title: Septic Shock
description: Septic shock is a severe complication of sepsis, characterized by persistent hypotension (low blood pressure) that doesn't respond to fluid resuscitation, and organ dysfunction.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set includes SNOMEDCT codes indicating a diagnosis of septic shock.),(Data Element Scope: This value set uses the FHIR US Core ConditionEncounterDiagnosis profile.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with a diagnosis of septic shock.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude codes that do not meet the inclusion criteria.)
